net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license
Class LicenseState

java.lang.Object
  net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license.LicenseState

public final class LicenseState
extends java.lang.Object

The LicenseState class represents the results of a Validation attempt on a license. Each time Validator.validate() is called, an Instance of LicenseState provides fine grained test results. This is returned either explicity through the Validator.validate() method or can be grabbed as a member object of the ValidatorException instance thrown during a failed validation attempt.

A LicenseState instance contains an immutable collection of TestResult, with each TestResult item containing the results of a specific test performed by the Validator. See both the Validator and TestResult pages for details on their usages.

LicenseState instances should only be created internally by the Padlock library. There are no known use cases where third party developers would need to explicitly instantiate a LicenseState object.

Author:
Jason Nichols (jason@padlocksoftware.net)

Method Detail

isValid

public boolean isValid()
Returns the result of the Validation process. A license is only considered valid if all tests have passed. Even a single test failure renders the license invalid.

Returns:
True if all TestResult instances have passed, or false otherwise.

getTests

public java.util.List<TestResult> getTests()
Get a list of all performed tests (including both those that passed and failed).

Returns:
An immutable list of LicenseTest results.

getPassedTests

public java.util.List<TestResult> getPassedTests()
Get a list of all passing tests.

Returns:
An immutable list of LicenseTest results that are passing, or an empty list if all tests failed.

getFailedTests

public java.util.List<TestResult> getFailedTests()
Get a list of all failed tests.

Returns:
An immutable list of LicenseTest results that are failing, or an empty list if all tests passed.

findTest

public TestResult findTest(java.lang.String testId)
Look up a TestResult by test ID.

Parameters:
testId - The unique String identifier for a test
Returns:
The instance of the TestResult, or null if no such test exists.
